title: ERROR    | [Errno 32] Broken pipe -  self.encoder.stdin.write(image.tobytes())
body:
Hey, I have been trying to get this working with podman for a few hours and I am finally breaking down and asking for help. 
It looks like its having a hard time writing to the output file. It create the file as expected, but its always 0 bytes after the crash. I have even gone so far as to set `-R 777` permissions on the folder the video files are in.  

Command I am running to start the container:
```shell
podman run -it --rm --privileged --security-opt=label=disable -v $PWD:/host ghcr.io/k4yt3x/video2x:5.0.0-beta5 -i '02-Andy-Joins-The-PTA.mkv' -o '02-Andy-Joins-The-PTA-waifu.mkv' -p1 upscale -h 1080 -a waifu2x -n3
```
Output from video2x container before the error:
